name: math-helper-gui
description: 스마트한 수학 계산기 - 자동 모드 전환, 결과 요약, 카테고리 필터링

scripts.build: node node_modules/cross-env/src/bin/cross-env.js NODE_ENV=production node node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js build && node build-preload.js
scripts.build:win: npm run build && node node_modules/cross-env/src/bin/cross-env.js NODE_ENV=production node node_modules/electron-builder/out/cli/cli.js --win --x64 --dir
scripts.pack:win: npm run build && node node_modules/cross-env/src/bin/cross-env.js NODE_ENV=production node node_modules/electron-builder/out/cli/cli.js --win --x64
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && node node_modules/cross-env/src/bin/cross-env.js NODE_ENV=production node node_modules/electron-builder/out/cli/cli.js --linux --x64 --dir
scripts.pack:linux: npm run build && node node_modules/cross-env/src/bin/cross-env.js NODE_ENV=production node node_modules/electron-builder/out/cli/cli.js --linux --x64
scripts.pack: npm run build && node node_modules/cross-env/src/bin/cross-env.js NODE_ENV=production node node_modules/electron-builder/out/cli/cli.js
